extendedInfo.description: Use our mobile app to work with your account, search the catalog, place holds, check items out, access our downloadables collection, find branch locations and operating hours, stay up-to-date on Library news, check our calendar of events, ask us a question, and connect with us on Facebook and Twitter.Our app includes a convenient feature that makes it possible for you to check out library items!  Select âUcheckâ from the menu, activate the barcode scanner, then scan your library material.We've also included a great new way to search our books. No need to search by field, no need to enter full words, no need to wait for results. Just type the first couple of letters of words and see the search in action while you type. So for books on "Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis" simply type "ja ke on".

reviews.title: Wonderful app, easy to use
reviews.comment: I visit the library\'s site daily and this makes it so convenient. I really like the option to checkout books with my phone. Fantastic app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Cindy Library app!
reviews.comment: This app lets you do everything, checkout e-books, e-audio books, check out books at the library with your phone, lets you access your account and so much more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.   Would love multi user ability
reviews.comment: Love this app but would like to know if there is a way to add multiple library card to one account and have the app remember number and pin.   I have two younger children who have their own cards and would like to track their checkouts without logging out of my own
reviews.author: Joe Walsh

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: Needs some fine tuning, like better event and news searches (only shows events and news from the past). Love the ucheck and the bar code search!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Work
reviews.comment: Ok for renewing items, horriable for finding items to put on hold. Tried to find the DVD movie \'The Thing\' (by John Carpenter) after 15mns & about 500 items with \"the\" or \"thing\" in the title, NOTHING. I searched on their website via my android default browser & found it in ONE mn. Come on! Where is advanced search?
reviews.author: Setnakt Frost

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: Absolutely great app.. convenient, quick, makes me love my library so much more ...love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for the library to make their own app. It\'s easy & convient to check out books & renew the right on your smartphone, I dont have to always be at my computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: It does what\'s the website does, but it would be nice if It notified me about late or overdue books so u could renew them, I got too many fees right now to renew my books so..... Eh that would be a real nice feature
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Works well on my epic 4G touch .. Glad I can renew the books without logging into a computer!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AS EASY AS ORDERING PIZZA. BUT WITH BOOKS.
reviews.comment: Order books for pickup, streamlined and so easy!
reviews.author: Vna Bristow

reviews.title: ??problem??
reviews.comment: What is wrong with this app? Any book I try to click on through catalog says 403error access denied. Can email details?? Extremely unhelpful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: now, update to allow me to pay fines via app by credit card!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: The library updated their system at the end of july and this app hasn\'t worked properly since
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful app, but kind of slow and requires re-login
reviews.comment: This app is quite useful with many features, but it\'s kind of slow on my phone, and always forgets my library card number and PIN so I have to enter it every time. Come on now, this is a mobile phone app - not like other people are going to steal my identity by logging in with it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more summaries
reviews.comment: Good overall, has a few useful features. I\'d like complete descriptions of books and DVDs, or just a simple plot would help.  I like the catalogue too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very usefull app
reviews.comment: I really enjoy ths app..
reviews.author: Nibin sunny

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Even better than using the website! This is a great app because it puts the library at your fingertips and is well organized.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs update!
reviews.comment: Does not work with new catalog system.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Thank you PLCH!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PLEASE UPDATE!
reviews.comment: The NEW catalog is ready today. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User
